channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-23617|2024-10-18T15:22:15.396Z -- symantec -- data%20loss%20prevention
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Symantec Data Loss Prevention version 14.0.2 and before. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a crafted document to achieve code execution.
